sentences.en: a voyage that was fraught with peril
Anyone who breaks the law does so at their peril.
But the town was all asleep . There was no peril of discovery.
sentences.cn: 不过,整个城镇都在睡梦之中,不会有被人发观的危险.

sentences.en: He believed his immortal soul was in peril.
sentences.cn: 他认为他不死的灵魂有堕入地狱的危险。

sentences.en: He is in peril of his life.

sentences.cn: 无视该问题要自担风险。

sentences.en: In spite of great peril, I have survived.
sentences.cn: 虽然处境非常危险，我还是挺过来了。

sentences.en: Is the arms race the greatest peril now?
sentences.cn: 军备竞赛是当今的最大危险 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was not the peril but the poverty that her family disliked.
sentences.cn: 她家所鄙夷的并非是险境,而是贫困.
走开,否则发生危险自己负责!

sentences.en: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.cn: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境,现在正面临灭绝的危险.

sentences.en: neglect our advice at your peril.
sentences.cn: 你忽视我们的忠告就要自己负责。

sentences.en: Shall I go even further, and say in inextricable peril?
sentences.cn: 我能不能说得更严重一点儿, 是处于难以脱身的险境之中 呢 ?

sentences.en: The British never awaken to peril until it is almost too late.
sentences.cn: 英国人从来不懂得防患于未然。

sentences.en: The embankment is in great peril.
the movement is in peril of dying.
The pernicious effect of this advertising on children is a problem that we ignore at our peril.
sentences.cn: 这则广告将对孩子有潜移默化的坏影响,我们置之不理,风险将由我们自己来承担.

sentences.en: We are in the gravest peril.
sentences.cn: 我们身处非常严重的危机之中。
